Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_CBERS4A;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.Spacecraft = CBERS4A;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.Filename = 'CBERS4A_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CBERS4A.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
